verses.text: <a href="../1-John-4-1/" title="1 John 4:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1  "JESUS_END"Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

<a href="../1-John-4-2/" title="1 John 4:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2  "JESUS_END"Hereby know ye the Spirit of God: Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God:

3 "JESUS_END"And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God: and this is that spirit of antichrist, whereof ye have heard that it should come; and even now already is it in the world.

<a href="../1-John-4-4/" title="1 John 4:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4  "JESUS_END"Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
<a href="../1-John-4-5/" title="1 John 4:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5  "JESUS_END"They are of the world: therefore speak they of the world, and the world heareth them.

<a href="../1-John-4-6/" title="1 John 4:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6  "JESUS_END"We are of God: he that knoweth God heareth us; he that is not of God heareth not us. Hereby know we the spirit of truth, and the spirit of error.

<a href="../1-John-4-7/" title="1 John 4:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7  "JESUS_END"Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of God; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God.
<a href="../1-John-4-8/" title="1 John 4:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8  "JESUS_END"He that loveth not knoweth not God; for God is love.

<a href="../1-John-4-9/" title="1 John 4:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9  "JESUS_END"In this was manifested the love of God toward us, because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world, that we might live through him.
10 "JESUS_END"Herein is love, not that we loved God, but that he loved us, and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins.
<a href="../1-John-4-11/" title="1 John 4:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11  "JESUS_END"Beloved, if God so loved us, we ought also to love one another.

<a href="../1-John-4-12/" title="1 John 4:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12  "JESUS_END"No man hath seen God at any time. If we love one another, God dwelleth in us, and his love is perfected in us.

<a href="../1-John-4-13/" title="1 John 4:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13  "JESUS_END"Hereby know we that we dwell in him, and he in us, because he hath given us of his Spirit.
14 "JESUS_END"And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world.

<a href="../1-John-4-15/" title="1 John 4:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15  "JESUS_END"Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God, God dwelleth in him, and he in God.

<a href="../1-John-4-16/" title="1 John 4:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16  "JESUS_END"And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us. God is love; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God, and God in him.

<a href="../1-John-4-17/" title="1 John 4:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17  "JESUS_END"Herein is our love made perfect, that we may have boldness in the day of judgment: because as he is, so are we in this world.

<a href="../1-John-4-18/" title="1 John 4:18 KJV verse detail"><span id="20" class="versehover">18  "JESUS_END"There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
<a href="../1-John-4-19/" title="1 John 4:19 KJV verse detail"><span id="21" class="versehover">19  "JESUS_END"We love him, because he first loved us.

<a href="../1-John-4-20/" title="1 John 4:20 KJV verse detail"><span id="22" class="versehover">20  "JESUS_END"If a man say, I love God, and hateth his brother, he is a liar: for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen, how can he love God whom he hath not seen?
<a href="../1-John-4-21/" title="1 John 4:21 KJV verse detail"><span id="23" class="versehover">21  "JESUS_END"And this commandment have we from him, That he who loveth God love his brother also.
